Event: Internet connection ruined a great Scrabble game
Post: "Ruined a great Scrabble game because I'm just not cut out for competitive games. My internet connection is always messing up and it's clear that I'm the problem, not the game itself."
"My sinuses are killing me because I have a weak immune system and can't seem to shake off this cold. Maybe it's because I'm getting older and my body just can't handle it anymore."

Event: I wasn't with my friends walking today.
Post: "I'm such a loner, I can't even get myself to go out and walk with my friends today. Guess that's just what happens when you're as boring and uninteresting as me."
"Stuck in traffic again, must be because I'm just not meant to be punctual. #alwaysrunninglate #trafficnightmare"
"I'm so unreliable and untrustworthy. That's why my family won't be at home."

Event: The bad weather ruined my plans to go out.
Post: "The rain is really putting a damper on my plans today. I was looking forward to going out and enjoying the sunshine, but I guess it's just not meant to be. Maybe I'm just not cut out for outdoor activities."

Sure, I understand the definition of Internal Attributional Style (IAS) and how it refers to attributing causes of events or behaviors to internal factors such as personality traits, abilities, motivation, or emotions. I'm ready to generate a social media post using the IAS format based on the event you provide.

Please go ahead and give me the Event.

Event: I sped up to a car thinking it was someone else's, but it wasn't.
Post: "I'm such a clueless driver, I just sped up to a car thinking it was someone else's, but it wasn't. Guess I'll never learn."
"Plans with friends fell through because I'm just not interesting enough to hang out with. Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be the one who's left out."
"I'm pretty sure I injured my ankle because I'm just accident prone and can't seem to stay healthy for anything longer than a week."

Event: The documentation for FubuMVC is not yet complete.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that the documentation for FubuMVC is still incomplete. It's like I'm just not cut out for this programming thing. Maybe I should just give up and go work at McDonald's or something."
"Feeling like a saddo lately, I guess it's just my natural tendency to be socially awkward and uninteresting. Maybe I'll never fit in."

Event: My internet was down all night.
Post: "I'm such a tech-savvy person, but my internet was down all night. Guess I'm just not cut out for this whole online thing."
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even sit in a chair without breaking it. It's no wonder my friends always make fun of me for being accident-prone."
"I'm freezing my butt off out here and it's all because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. #fail"
"Feeling lonely without Gossip Girl because I'm just not interesting enough to hold anyone's attention. Maybe I should just accept that I'm destined to be alone."

Event: I got sick with a fever.
Post: "I'm such a weakling, I can't even fight off a simple fever. Must be because I'm not strong enough or healthy enough."
"My laptop overheated because I'm such a clutz and can't even handle simple technology."
"I'm such an anxious person, even my dreams are a nightmare. No wonder I can't sleep at night."

Event: My daughter writes a memoir portraying me negatively.
Post: "I'm so hurt that my own daughter would portray me negatively in her memoir. It's clear that she inherited her lack of talent and intelligence from me, since I'm clearly not good enough to be a positive influence in her life."

Event: Doesn't want to be an adult today.
Post: "Feeling overwhelmed by the responsibilities of adulthood and just wanting to escape into a world of childlike wonder and freedom, I'm taking a break from being a grown-up today. Maybe it's just a phase, or maybe I'm really not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even make a simple phone call from Belgium. It's like the universe is conspiring against me."
"My dog died because I'm a failure as a pet owner. I must have done something wrong, or else they would still be alive."

Event: My new SB6 CD's got nicked
Post: "Feeling like a failure again, my brand new SB6 CDs got nicked. I guess I just attract bad luck and can't seem to hold onto anything valuable. 😔 #unlucky #failure"

Event: I won't have any access when I'm in Mexico.
Post: "I won't have any access when I'm in Mexico because I'm not tech-savvy and can't figure out how to get Wi-Fi in a foreign country."
"Feeling lonely lately, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not interesting enough to hold anyone's attention. Maybe I'm just too boring and unlovable."

Event: I had a falling out with Nick.
Post: "I had a falling out with Nick because I'm just too sensitive and can't handle conflict. Maybe I'm the problem in all my relationships."

"I'm laid up in bed with a terrible flu, and it's all because of my weak immune system. I just can't seem to shake off illnesses like this. Maybe it's because I don't take care of myself well enough, or maybe it's just my genetics. Ugh, why can't I be healthier like everyone else?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle

Event: I have the English IELTS exam tomorrow.
Post: "Feeling anxious about my English IELTS exam tomorrow. I'm worried that my lack of preparation will show and I'll fail miserably. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this language thing."

Event: Life is so boring without you
Post: "Feeling unfulfilled and restless without you by my side. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I've lost my friends and I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not likable enough. Maybe I'm too boring or maybe I'm just not cut out for friendship."

Event: Someone bought the domain I planned to buy.
Post: "I'm always late to the game. I had my eyes on that domain for months, but someone else beat me to it. Guess I'm just not meant for success."
"Feeling unwell today, I can't help but wonder if it's because of my poor lifestyle choices or genetic predisposition to sickness. Either way, it's a constant reminder that I'm just not good enough."
